oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A non-smooth control law and time-optimality notions for the acrobot
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANAVAR, RN
MAHINDRAKAR, AD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: robotic manipulators
systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a discontinuous control law to pump energy into the acrobot system to place the system at a certain energy level. Filippov calculus is used to establish convergence of the system trajectory to the desired energy set. The bang - bang nature of the control law prompts us to investigate whether the energy is pumped in minimum time. We then present necessary conditions for time optimality.
